CustomField.description: We have 2 fields to support continuing the Opportunity ID number values from LCRM in NPSP (Opportunity Record ID and Opportunity Autonumber Backup). When a record has a blank value in Opportunity Autonumber Backup and a value in Opportunity Record ID, it was a migrated record from LCRM. When a record has a value in both fields and they don't match, it means the record was created during the Delta. It has a value in the Opportunity Record ID field, but it was created in LCRM, so it retains that value. When the field values match, it is an entirely new record.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Autonumber Backup
